channel.title: Virat Kohli on TechnoStreet

item.title: “You know I love you but just chill”: Kevin Pietersen requests Virat Kohli to have a day off during India vs England World Cup semi final 2022
item.description: “You know I love you but just chill”: Kevin Pietersen requests Virat Kohli to have a day off during India vs England World Cup semi final 2022 The Adelaide Oval in Adelaide is set to host the 2nd semi-final of the ICC T20 World Cup 2022 between India and England.
